titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 17 of title 28, United States Code, to provide that bankruptcy judges and magistrates may receive cost-of-living adjustments to their annuities after ceasing the practice of law, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6748)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/9/1994--Introduced. Amends the Federal judicial code to provide for cost-of-living adjustments to the annuities of bankruptcy judges and magistrates after they cease practicing law.
